summary:
I am a driven ICT/Finance professional with 24 years of experience in many aspects of ICT and Finance & Control.

During my career I have worn many hats: I started as Assistant Auditor, moved to an Accounting/Controllers function and then switched to the ICT/ERP world. As ERP consultant I have experience in many aspects of the implementation of Financial, ERP and CRM applications such as Project Management, System Analysis and Design, Data Migration, Technical Installations and Upgrades, development of Forms and Management Reports and user training. 

The last 12 years I have worked as independent consultant in both ICT and Finance & Control projects.

My added value lies in particular in this combination of my financial background and experience and affinity with automation. As I speak both the language of system users and the technical language of developers and have a good understanding of database structures and languages, I am especially strong when I can combine these areas. 

I am very driven to learn new things, to continue to evolve and to pursue the highest quality.

Characteristics: analytic, hands-on mentality, pragmatic and results-oriented, perseverance, creative, loyal and flexible attitude, clear and enthusiastic communications style (with a touch of humour).

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: Implementation of Compiere at Camso
projects.description:
Implementation (2006) and upgrade (2012) of Compiere (ERP System) at Camso. 

In 2006 I was responsible for the Data Migration from Epicor, the ERP system which I helped implementing as ERP consultant working for Platinum Services Europe BV. I also assisted in the System Design, Testing and User Training and developed Management Reports and Forms in Jasper, Crystal and Microsoft Access.

As from February 2012 I also support Compiere users in other European countries (France, Germany and UK) and am intermediate between the headquarters in Canada, the Compiere users in Europe and the developers in Sri Lanka, translating the user defined requirements to Functional and Technical Specifications.

projects.title: Implementation of Batchmaster/Platinum at Inver Ltd
projects.description:
Implementation and various upgrades of Batchmaster/Platinum for Windows (PFW) at Inver UK Ltd, a Liverpool based company producing and trading in Industrial Coatings.

Development of management reports in Frx, Crystal en Access.

During the years I have developed many add-ons in Microsoft Access/VBA, linked to the Batchmaster/PFW database, to automate the order intake, production and production planning, QC and accounting processes.

projects.title: Various Accounting/Office Automation projects
projects.description: Elimination of administrative backlogs, complex consolidations, screening and improving administrative processes, improve efficiency by Office Automation and more effective use of functionalities of Accounting and ERP systems, develop Budgeting System etc. for various companies.

projects.title: Financial Accountant at BT (British Telecom)
projects.description:
Responsible for Management Reporting and Statutory Accounts of 10 holding companies of BT.
Liaised with auditors and tax advisors. 
Accounting for various mergers and liquidations.

projects.title: Centralisation Accounting 6 Foreign Branches of Swets (SAP)
projects.description:
Responsible for the centralisation and standardization of accounting processes for 6 foreign entities for Swets, a subscription services company.

The accounting was done locally in the U.S, Germany, Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Belgium. These processes have been centralised and standardized, taking into account local requirements relating to Statutory Accounts, Corporate Income Tax Returns, VAT returns and salary administration.  

The accounting system used was SAP.

projects.title: Implementation of Microsoft  Dynamics/Assistance at KOW Architecten
projects.description:
Implementation of Microsoft Dynamics / Assistance (system designed specifically for architect firms) with large architect firm in The Hague. 

I started with a project to streamline the financial processes and improve management control, followed by a request to assist in cleaning up administrative backlogs and assist in the preparation of the Statutory Accounts for the various legal entities.

When Microsoft Dynamics was implemented I played a role as Project Manager and was responsible for the Design and Testing in liaison with the Dynamics consultant. I was also responsible for the Migration of historical data, which had to be adjusted to a new reporting and consolidation structure. Furthermore I developed management reports in AtlasXL en Crystal.

projects.title: Implementation of Fortuna at WTS Advocaten in The Hague
projects.description:
This project also started with a request to streamline the financial processes and improve management control. After setting up accounting processes, I have been responsible for the Monthly Management Accounts for a couple of years.

I have been responsible for selecting new ERP-software and assisted with the implementation of Fortuna (a system designed for lawyers firms). I have been involved in the Design, Testing and Data Migration as well as the Development of Management Reports.

I have developed an application in Access/VBA for the insolvency administration, which is still used today and which I continue to support.
